JD:
About the job
    


Our Company
Changing the world through digital experiences is what Adobe’s all about. We give everyone—from emerging artists to global brands—everything they need to design and deliver exceptional digital experiences! We’re passionate about empowering people to create beautiful and powerful images, videos, and apps, and transform how companies interact with customers across every screen.
We’re on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating exceptional employee experiences where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. We realize that new ideas can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours!
Our team is looking for a driven developer who loves building delightful experiences for the creative professional across the full web solution stack, from user experiences to the services that support them. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for details and high standards for code quality and efficiency. Join our awesome Adobe Stock team!
Adobe Stock is a leading online marketplace for digital assets that provides designers and businesses access to hundreds of millions of high-quality, curated, royalty-free photos, vectors, illustrations, templates, audio and 3D assets for all their creative projects. The Adobe Stock service provides an interactive web experience and is integrated with Adobe desktop apps to search, browse, and access assets across desktop and mobile devices.
What You'll Do
You’ll be working on an agile development team, crafting innovative new features and maintaining existing ones using world-class technologies. You'll also be expected to debug issues across multiple systems, regularly share knowledge with peers, and contribute to architectural design discussions. Candidates who enjoy tackling complex technical challenges, have a passion for delighting customers, and who are motivated to solve problems will thrive in our highly collaborative environment.
What You Need To Succeed
5+ years of proven experience developing consumer facing web applicationsB.S. in Computer Science, or a related fieldLove to learn new things, build cool software, and have funProficiency in JavaScript and Node.jsExperience implementing modern JavaScript techniques, such as modules, async/await, compiling and bundling, and server renderingUnderstanding of ES6 / ES2015 and newer, React, Redux, Express, Webpack, or similar web technologiesExperience building, maintaining, and monitoring highly available micro services using Node.js, PHP, or similarKnowledge of how to apply computer science principles to real world problems, including algorithms, data structures, distributed systems, and data flow and storageStrong familiarity with SOLID design principles and object oriented programming
At Adobe, you will be immersed in an exceptional work environment that is recognized throughout the world on Best Companies lists . You will also be surrounded by colleagues who are committed to helping each other grow through our outstanding Check-In approach where ongoing feedback flows freely.

The Opportunity 
As a Software Engineer in ATS (Adobe Technical Services), you'll design, build and support solutions serving global, sales, and customer success management teams on Microsoft Dynamics and other leading cloud and on-premise platforms. You'll work on unique enterprise problems in a large, complex environment managing millions of records and daily transactions. While working on a full stack of technologies, you'll have an opportunity to make a meaningful impact on our business customers.
What You’ll Do
Build world-class technological solutions, adhere to engineering development standards, and meet business expectations. Configure and Develop business-critical solutions in Salesforce.com, Microsoft Dynamics, and Gainsight platform using the cloud-based programming language. Build integrations between our front-end and back-end systems using HTTP, JSON, and RESTful design principles, using SnapLogic, Layer 7, and Adobe.IO gateway services, etc. Collaborate with the team (onshore/offshore) on design, code review, and contribute to standard SDLC methodologies & CICDLead technical efforts, and work closely with Technical Architects, Scrum Masters, Business Systems Analysts, and Quality Engineering team members in a geographically distributed Agile-scrum team. Estimate efforts for feature delivery at both the high-level & detailed level and take ownership of the deliverables. Troubleshoot issues quickly and identify and address root causes, define the solution and get the resolutions deployed. Adhere to architecture, security, and change management guardrails, follow and enrich internal standards and best practices and work to bring on future technologies that improve platforms, efficiency, and scalability to the systems. Be forward-looking regarding new features and other technology or tooling that bring new opportunities for efficiency, productivity, and development gain across the entire support ecosystem. What you need to succeed
BS or MS in Computer Science or related field5+ years of software engineering experience managing highly sophisticated CRM implementations. Experience with Microsoft Azure services (Application servers, Database Services, Service Bus)Experience in web services and integrations using HTTP and RESTful design principlesProven experience using structured, disciplined approaches to solving technical, data, and logical problems. Strong fundamentals in object-oriented languages and client-side technologies like HTML, CSS, Javascript, and Javascript frameworksDeep understanding of SDLC, web technologies, application security, database concepts, and software architectures. Understanding of version control systems (GitHub) and build tools (Jenkins, Maven, and ANT)Preferred 3+ years experience with the Agile methodology, story & sprint tracking tools such as JIRA or equivalentExcellent verbal and written communication skills. Able to clearly articulate sophisticated problems and solutions in terms that others can understandIntense curiosity and a sincere interest in learning new technologies, platforms, and business processes
